resources.string: So much work was done to provide you with this app
Kindly rate the app to support the developer.\n Your feedback is important.
Type the IMEI you want to analyze and click this button. We will tell you if the IMEI is correct or not correct
Generate custom IMEI by typing your desired digits and click this button
Cannot find EngineerMode App - Mediatek chipset is mandatory and stock ROM must be installed
Generate IMEI for specific phones by selecting the phone from the list
Select the Brand of the phone and choose the model
Click this button to compare specifications of two or more devices
Kindly give a good rating to support developer of this app
, please take a moment to rate the app.
Select any language of your choice by clicking this icon
Click this item when in each page or tab for instructions on how to use the functions
Click this icon to get many more options like MTK Engineering and Fetch My IMEI
